title: New: The Neighbourhood – Let It Go
content:
Having just finished their debut UK jaunt, Californian hip-pop outfit The Neighbourhood are set to release their next single, Let It Go via Columbia records.

Continuing with the same slick, almost too-cool vibe found on their debut EP I’m Sorry, it’s a mixture of ready made pophits with the R’n’B swagger that the likes of The Weeknd and Lana Del Rey have captured. Check out Let It Go below. Big choruses, bigger ambitions.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
